evidenceSource.title: Fourth-generation TKI BLU-945 overcomes C797S resistance
keyFindings: PFS 14.5 months vs. no available therapy

changes.rationale: High-quality evidence (Phase I/II, FDA designation, peer-reviewed)
Critical unmet need, no previous entity in ontology
High-quality result from Phase I/II trial

evolutionScenarios.aiJustification: ‚úÖ AUTO-APPROVED: FDA breakthrough + peer-reviewed + SHACL valid + no conflicts

evidenceSource.title: Alectinib vs. Brigatinib in 1L ALK+ NSCLC - Head-to-head trial
keyFindings: Brigatinib PFS 24.0 months vs. Alectinib 34.8 months (p=0.001)
Alectinib confirmed superior to brigatinib in 1L
Previous assumption: Brigatinib = Alectinib needs revision

changes.rationale: Direct comparative trial overrides previous assumption of equivalence
Maintain as option but clarify hierarchy

proposedChanges.reasoning: ‚ö†Ô∏è CONFLICTING DATA: Ontology assumed equivalence, new trial shows superiority. Human review needed for clinical judgment.

evolutionScenarios.aiJustification: ‚ö†Ô∏è HUMAN REVIEW REQUIRED: Direct comparative data conflicts with ontology ranking. Clinical expertise needed to interpret.

evidenceSource.title: Metformin co-administration improves EGFR TKI outcomes: 10-year real-world data
keyFindings: Metformin + EGFR TKI: PFS 16.2m vs. 13.8m (HR 0.82, p<0.001)
Effect consistent across all EGFR mutations

proposedChanges.scenario: Scenario 3: AI Proposes ‚Üí Human OK ‚Üí Gens Auto-commits

changes.rationale: Upgrade status from 'repurposing candidate' to 'validated combination'

proposedChanges.reasoning: ‚úÖ HIGH-QUALITY RWD: Large sample, significant results, validates hypothesis. Recommend human OK then auto-commit.
proposedChanges.commitMessage: feat(ontology): Add Metformin+EGFR TKI combination based on RWD (JCO 2024, n=12458)

impactAssessment.clinicalSignificance: HIGH - low-cost intervention with proven benefit

evolutionScenarios.aiJustification: ‚úÖ RECOMMENDED FOR APPROVAL: RWD validates preclinical hypothesis. Low risk (metformin is safe), high benefit (PFS/OS improvement).

evidenceSource.title: Hepatotoxicity signal with Drug_X in combination with osimertinib

changes.rationale: FDA safety alert requires immediate action
